title: Venus Transit in the 6th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the sixth house shifts focus toward daily routines, work environment, and practical harmony for Leo ascendants. Relationships at work become smoother when diplomacy is applied. You may seek comfort in routines and wellness, but consistency matters more than indulgence. This phase supports resolving conflicts gracefully, improving health habits, and finding balance between service and self-care through thoughtful choices.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Preference for order and pleasant routines

sections.heading: Career
points: Client or service roles benefit from diplomacy
Good for healthcare, HR, or support functions

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Need to avoid criticism masked as concern

sections.heading: Finance
points: Spending on health or daily needs

closing: This transit teaches harmony through service. When routines are refined with care, daily life becomes smoother and more fulfilling.
